languages.text: "Хальбрандт, сможешь ты защитить себя в одиночку, если Вольному Торговцу потребуется моя помощь? Голод мой не утих, и я бы с радостью отсек еще пару голов грязноязыких еретиков".
"Halbrandt, can you defend yourself alone if the Rogue Trader has need of my aid? My hunger is not sated, and I would gladly cleave a few more foul-tongued heads from their heretic bodies."
languages.original_text: "Хальбрандт, сможешь ты защитить себя в одиночку, если Вольному Торговцу потребуется моя помощь? Голод мой не утих, и я бы с радостью отсек еще пару голов грязноязыких еретиков".

traits.locale_text: "Halbrandt, can you defend yourself alone if the Rogue Trader has need of my aid? My hunger is not sated, and I would gladly cleave a few more foul-tongued heads from their heretic bodies."
"Halbrandt, can you defend yourself alone if the Rogue Trader has need of my aid? My hunger is not sated, and I would gladly cleave a few more foul-tongued heads from their heretic bodies."
"Halbrandt, can you defend yourself alone if the Rogue Trader has need of my aid? My hunger is not sated, and I would gladly cleave a few more foul-tongued heads from their heretic bodies."
"Halbrandt, can you defend yourself alone if the Rogue Trader has need of my aid? My hunger is not sated, and I would gladly cleave a few more foul-tongued heads from their heretic bodies."

languages.text: “哈尔布兰特，如果行商浪人需要我帮助的话，你能保护好你自己吗？我的饥渴还没有得到满足。我打算再去收拾几个满口污言秽语的异端分子，亲手把他们的脑袋摘下来。”
languages.original_text: "Halbrandt, can you defend yourself alone if the Rogue Trader has need of my aid? My hunger is not sated, and I would gladly cleave a few more foul-tongued heads from their heretic bodies."

traits.locale_text: “哈尔布兰特，如果行商浪人需要我帮助的话，你能保护好你自己吗？我的饥渴还没有得到满足。我打算再去收拾几个满口污言秽语的异端分子，亲手把他们的脑袋摘下来。”

languages.text: 「ハルブラント、自由開拓者が俺の力を必要としたときは、自分で自分の身を守れよ？俺の飢えはまだ満たされちゃいないんだ。汚い舌がついた異端者の頭と身体をもう2、3人分、喜んでお別れさせてやるよ」
languages.original_text: "Halbrandt, can you defend yourself alone if the Rogue Trader has need of my aid? My hunger is not sated, and I would gladly cleave a few more foul-tongued heads from their heretic bodies."

traits.locale_text: 「ハルブラント、自由開拓者が俺の力を必要としたときは、自分で自分の身を守れよ？俺の飢えはまだ満たされちゃいないんだ。汚い舌がついた異端者の頭と身体をもう2、3人分、喜んでお別れさせてやるよ」

languages.text: «Halbrandt, ¿te sabrías defender tú solo si el Comerciante Independiente precisara mi ayuda? Aún no he callado el hambre y arrancaría con gusto unas cabezas deslenguadas más de esos cuerpos herejes».
languages.original_text: "Halbrandt, can you defend yourself alone if the Rogue Trader has need of my aid? My hunger is not sated, and I would gladly cleave a few more foul-tongued heads from their heretic bodies."

traits.locale_text: «Halbrandt, ¿te sabrías defender tú solo si el Comerciante Independiente precisara mi ayuda? Aún no he callado el hambre y arrancaría con gusto unas cabezas deslenguadas más de esos cuerpos herejes».

languages.text: « Halbrandt, pourras-tu te défendre seul si {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} a besoin de mon aide ? Je ne suis pas encore rassasié et je me ferai un plaisir de trancher quelques têtes hérétiques de plus. »
languages.original_text: "Halbrandt, can you defend yourself alone if the Rogue Trader has need of my aid? My hunger is not sated, and I would gladly cleave a few more foul-tongued heads from their heretic bodies."

traits.locale_text: « Halbrandt, pourras-tu te défendre seul si {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} a besoin de mon aide ? Je ne suis pas encore rassasié et je me ferai un plaisir de trancher quelques têtes hérétiques de plus. »

languages.text: "Halbrandt, könnt Ihr Euch alleine verteidigen, wenn {mf|der Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} meine Hilfe benötigt? Mein Hunger ist nicht gestillt, und ich würde gerne noch weitere übelzungige Köpfe von Ketzerkörpern trennen."
languages.original_text: "Halbrandt, can you defend yourself alone if the Rogue Trader has need of my aid? My hunger is not sated, and I would gladly cleave a few more foul-tongued heads from their heretic bodies."

traits.locale_text: "Halbrandt, könnt Ihr Euch alleine verteidigen, wenn {mf|der Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} meine Hilfe benötigt? Mein Hunger ist nicht gestillt, und ich würde gerne noch weitere übelzungige Köpfe von Ketzerkörpern trennen."

languages.text: "Halbrandt, Hür Tacir benim yardımıma ihtiyaç duyarsa kendi kendini savunabilir misin? Açlığım henüz dinmedi, birkaç tane daha kötü dilli kelleyi kâfir bedeninden ayırmak beni mutlu edecek."
languages.original_text: "Halbrandt, can you defend yourself alone if the Rogue Trader has need of my aid? My hunger is not sated, and I would gladly cleave a few more foul-tongued heads from their heretic bodies."

traits.locale_text: "Halbrandt, Hür Tacir benim yardımıma ihtiyaç duyarsa kendi kendini savunabilir misin? Açlığım henüz dinmedi, birkaç tane daha kötü dilli kelleyi kâfir bedeninden ayırmak beni mutlu edecek."
